lead_paragraph: Bruce LaBruce (OTTO, THE RASPBERRY REICH, GERONTOPHILIA) teams up with photographer Rick Castro in a wild re-imagining of SUNSET BOULEVARD set on the hot hustling scene of 90's Santa Monica Boulevard.
snippet: Bruce LaBruce (OTTO, THE RASPBERRY REICH, GERONTOPHILIA) teams up with photographer Rick Castro in a wild re-imagining of SUNSET BOULEVARD set on the hot hustling scene of 90's Santa Monica Boulevard.
